DOC.brief_title: Digital SpyGlass Confirmed Common Bile Duct Stones Clearance Without Fluoroscopy
DOC.detailed_description: Patients This study recruit patient suspected/confirmed CBDS clinical manifestation , liver function test image study . With CBD size 5 15 millimeter , measure transabdominal ultrasonography ( US ) , compute tomography ( CT ) , magnetic resonance cholangiopancreatography ( MRCP ) endoscopic ultrasonography ( EUS ) . The exclusion criterion history bile duct surgery , bile duct stricture , bile duct tumor , severe comorbid disease , unstable vital sign , pregnancy , coagulopathy . All patient inform write informed consent procedure . Procedures Non-fluoroscopic CBDS removal perform experienced endoscopists , use standard side-viewing duodenoscope . After identified major papilla , investigator perform bile duct cannulation guidewire assist technique . Successful cannulation confirm visualized bile aspiration . If patient difficult cannulation , double guidewire technique use . After successful bile duct cannulation , investigator perform endoscopic standard sphincterotomy ( EST ) . Precut sphincterotomy use study . Non fluoroscopic balloon extraction perform . The balloon push hilum investigator sweep suspect complete CBD clearance . After investigator use digital SpyGlassTM confirm complete clearance CBDS . If SpyGlassTM show residual CBD stone , investigator repeat balloon extraction . If SpyGlassTM show complete clearance , investigator proceed perform final cholangiogram reference standard study .
